s: Anheuser-Busch is one of the largest brewers in the world, producing beer under the labels Budweiser, Bud Light, Busch, Michelob, and Stella Artois, as well as several craft beer brands. In 2008, it became a subsidiary of Anheuser-Busch InBev. The headquarters are in St. Louis, Missouri.

Adolphus Busch, a German immigrant, arrived in the United States in 1857. By 1861, Adolphus had married Lilly Anheuser, the daughter of local businessman Eberhard Anheuser. t: Anheuser-Busch’s Michelob ULTRA and Busch Light Surge As Top 2 Fastest-Growing Brands in Beer Industry | Anheuser-Busch
s: St. Louis, MO – January 24, 2025 – As America’s leading brewer and a top American manufacturer, Anheuser-Busch (NYSE:BUD) continues to drive momentum of the beer category with the two fastest-growing brands in the beer industry in the most recent quarter: Michelob ULTRA and Busch Light.
